title: Chalmaar Lyrics Devi(l) Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Devi(l) Chalmaar Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Benny Dayal
Chalmaar!!

paththu mani vaakkula
pachchayappaa's raodula
short skirtkorr jennifer

adithadi nadakkala
vettu kuththu vilugala
azhagula paakkuraa jennifer

chellame thangame
mellamaa paaradi
seththu kiththu povendi

nee sari sari nu
orumura sonnaa
sathiya polappendi

appappaa hippula
summeru winter thaan
bend it like beckkam baby
Chalmaar!!

love feel kannil irukku
no ball penne edharku
namma kadhalukku naduvula
screen edharku

life-il tension edharku
lighta siri enakku
andha sirippula thaane
sorgam irukku

loveula vilundhu
loveula ezhundhu
marupadi viluvomaa

adi penne penne va
lovers aagi
vaanathil parappomaa

appappaa hippula
summeru winter thaan
bend it like beckkam baby
Chalmaar!!

krishna endhan peruthaan
vaadaa flower naanthaan
en brindhavan thottathukku
queen neethaan

kiss me single naanthan
touch me mingle aavom
en thananthani desertula
rain neethaan

full moon naduvula
rainbow pola azhagaa
irukkuriye

tea kada boiler pol
en nenjil soodaa
kodhikkiriye

appappaa hippula
summeru winter thaan
bend it like beckkam baby
Chalmaar!!
